channel.title: Console commands to improve performance?
channel.description: Hi! Your work is amazing, i love the mod. I have a good PC but not a very good graphics card, a Nvidia 6150SE NForce 430 512mb, so i can't get a decent frame-rate all the time, even on the lowest settings... So, my question is: Are there commands who can help to improve performance? Thanks.

item.title: Console commands to improve performance?
item.dc:creator: Nelus86
item.description:
Yes there are.
Posted a thread like 5 minutes ago with explaining, but to be honest u might need to buy a better graphics card.

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=13155

Hope it helps, Good luck

Read full topic
